make-one-for-us: Make one for us. Make it!
drink-whenever-you-want: You can drink whenever you want.
biggest-star-solar-system: What is the biggest star in our solar system? If you get it wrong, drink 1 shot.
drink-one-shot-stop-being-silly: Drink one shot. To stop being silly!
born-in-rio-de-janeiro: Who is born in the state of Rio de Janeiro is what? If wrong, drink 4 gulps.
drink-1-shot-lemon-salt: Drink 1 shot of lemon with salt!
make-a-choice: Make a choice. If you prefer not to drink shots, drink 2 now. If you prefer, make someone drink a shot.
you-and-friends-drink-3-gulps: You and your friends drink 3 gulps.
challenge-someone-flip-cup: Challenge someone to play flip cup; the loser drinks 2 shots. Details: 3 half-filled beer cups.
tell-something-nobody-knows: Tell something that nobody knows. If someone knows, drink 3 gulps.
if-your-cup-is-full-flip-it: If your cup is full, flip it. If not, the person to your right drinks 4 gulps.
choose-funniest-person-drink-shot: Choose the person you think is funniest to drink a shot of tequila with you.
choose-player-sit-out-5-minutes: Choose a player to sit out for 5 minutes, without a phone. The chosen one must flip your cup before leaving.
make-funny-gesture: Make a funny gesture. If no one finds it funny, drink 4 gulps.
dance-on-the-mouth-of-the-bottle: Dance on the bottle's mouth and choose someone to drink 2 gulps.
drink-glass-of-water: Drink a glass of water. It’s good for you!
choose-nickname-for-left-player: Choose a nickname for the player to your left. Everyone must call them by that name until the end of the game. Anyone who fails to do so drinks 3 gulps.
what-is-it-clear-and-salty: What is clear and salty, fits in an eye, and weighs a ton? If wrong, flip your cup.
say-a-flaw: Say a flaw of yours. If the group agrees, you get +5 gulp-pass; otherwise, drink them.
fill-your-cup-with-water: Fill your cup with water and drink it all.
take-10-minute-break: You may take a 10-minute break if you want.
cant-leave-table-20-minutes: You cannot leave the table for 20 minutes.
choose-someone-to-kiss: Choose someone to kiss you now. If no one wants to, you must drink 1 shot.
try-to-make-someone-laugh: Try to make someone laugh. If they laugh, they drink 3 gulps; otherwise, you drink it yourself.
give-a-compliment-or-gesture: Give a compliment or make a funny gesture. If anyone laughs, they drink 4 gulps.
name-10-capitals: Name 10 capitals in 20 seconds or flip your cup.
choose-someone-drink-2-shots-navel: Choose someone to drink 2 shots from your navel.
beer-has-lots-of-cups: This beer has a lot of cups. Choose someone to drink it.
lucky-drink-whenever-want: Lucky, you can drink whenever you want now.
write-number-0-9: Write a number from 0 to 9, choose someone to guess. If they guess right, you drink the number in gulps. If wrong, you get the number in gulp-pass.
what-color-s-perdigao: What is the color of the 'S' in Perdigão? If wrong, drink 6 gulps.
drink-glass-homemade-serum: Drink a glass of homemade serum.
relax-dont-drink-anything: Relax, you don't have to drink anything.
who-drank-king-rome-clothes: Who drank the clothes of the king of Rome? Worth 4 gulps.
do-dance-or-drink-4-gulps: Do a dance or drink 4 gulps.
eat-garlic-clove-or-drink-1-shot: Eat a clove of garlic or drink 1 shot.
lucky-no-shot-game: Lucky, you don't have to drink any shots during the whole game.
tell-funny-story: Tell a funny story you've experienced. The group judges if it's worth it. Worth 6 gulps.
congrats-2-gulp-pass: Congratulations! You won 2 gulp-pass! Now make someone take 1 shot.
fill-cup-add-shot-alcohol: Fill your cup and add a shot of alcohol (recommend tequila + salt).
swap-your-cup-for-water: Swap your cup for a glass of water.
if-you-are-single-choose-single: If you are single, choose another single to sit on your lap for 2 minutes.
what-animal-never-walks-alone: What is the animal that never walks alone? When do they go out for a walk?
count-odd-numbers-to-31: Count the odd numbers up to 31 in 15 seconds or drink 3 gulps.
dance-if-you-feel-like: Dance if you feel like it; if not, drink 5 gulps.
who-speaks-one-language-flip-cup: Who speaks only one language flips the cup.
first-to-drink-buys-everyone-drink: The first to drink buys a drink for everyone.
most-energetic-drinks-4-gulps: The most energetic person at the table drinks 4 gulps.
calmest-drinks-4-gulps: The calmest person at the table drinks 4 gulps.
everyone-wins-lottery-drinks-shot: You won the lottery. Everyone drinks a shot.
parents-drink-one-shot-per-child: Parents drink one shot per child.
childless-drink-whatever: Childless people drink as much as they want.
if-age-even-number-drink-4-gulps: If your age is an even number, drink 4 gulps.
wear-extra-clothing-piece: Whoever wears an extra piece of clothing until the end of the game gets a drink from each player at the next party.
divide-birthday-day-month: Divide the day of your birthday by the month. If the result is less than 2, drink a gulp. Otherwise, gain 2 gulp-pass.
choose-biggest-eater: Choose who eats the most at the table. The 'hungry one' must eat everything on the table or drink 2 shots.
first-to-fart-gets-2-gulp-pass: The first to fart gets +2 gulp-pass.
drink-everything-on-table: Everyone drinks everything on the table (without spilling). Whoever drinks the least buys (goes to get) 8 cans.
play-until-someone-loses-flip-cup: Play until someone makes a mistake. The loser flips the cup.
house-treat-everyone-fill-cups: On the house. Everyone fill your cups.
left-handed-drink-4-gulps: Anyone who writes with their left hand drinks 4 gulps.
everyone-says-song-phrase: Everyone must sing a phrase from a song, whoever gets it wrong drinks 2 gulps.
finish-drinks: THIS ROUND IS OVER, FINISH YOUR DRINKS!
press-play: Press play to start the game
